entities.name: ministry workers
entities.description: Ministry workers are mentioned as toppling out of fireplaces below them. They are described as being intimidated by Runcorn.

entities.name: runcorn
entities.description: Runcorn is a wizard who is intimidating the Ministry workers and Harry, who is impersonating him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving a heavy blow on the back of his legs and is also impersonating Runcorn.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as whispering to Harry, indicating that she is present in the scene.

entities.name: magical maintenance
entities.description: Magical Maintenance is a group of wizards and witches who are involved in maintaining magical objects and structures.

relationships.description: Harry is impersonating Runcorn, as indicated by the conversation between Harry and Hermione.
The ferrety wizard from Magical Maintenance gestures to Harry, indicating that they are interacting with each other.
